titles.title: A resolution congratulating the Penn State IFC/Panhellenic Dance Marathon on its continued success in support of the Four Diamonds Fund at Penn State Hershey Children's Hospital.
A resolution congratulating the Penn State IFC/Panhellenic Dance Marathon on its continued success in support of the Four Diamonds Fund at Penn State Hershey Children's Hospital.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

term.name: Social work, volunteer service, charitable organizations

bill.summary:
Congratulates the Penn State IFC/Panhellenic Dance Marathon (THON) on its continued success in support of the Four Diamonds Fund at Penn State Hershey Children's Hospital.
Commends the school's students, volunteers, and supporting organizations for their hard work in organizing another record breaking THON.
